mapper.insert: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{content},0,now(),#{user_no},(select if(max(group_no)is null,1,max(group_no)+1)from board b),1,0)
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title,b.content,date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date,b.user_no,u.name as user_name from board b join user u on b.user_no = u.no where b.no = #{_parameter}
select concat('[RE]:',title) as title,no from board where no = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{content},0,now(),#{user_no}, (select group_no from board b where no=#{no}),(select order_no+1 from board b where no=#{no}), (select depth+1 from board b where no=#{no}))
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title,u.name as user_name,hit,date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as reg_date,b.user_no,b.depth from board b join user u on b.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc;
